property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
Periphery undesirables have launched a PIRATE AMBUSH on a planet you are defending! The pirates' goal will be to capture your units. If they succeed in winning, any of your disabled units has a high chance of being captured. But that sword cuts both ways--if YOU win, pirates don't usually stick around to recover their own disabled units. So fight hard, Commander. Teach those pirate scum a lesson for attacking our planet!!!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Center Deployment Chance: 33.3% -- pirates often succeed in landing without notice and ambush their targets

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in the Pirate operations
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel, if winner
* Influence (Standard Defender): 2000 BV: ~45 flu / 4000 BV: ~75 flu / 6000 BV: ~105 flu
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,264 CBills / 4000 BV: ~5,663 CBills / 6000 BV: ~8,063 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Stand Your Ground: ADDITIONAL -40% pay penalty if you surrender before a **50% BV loss** -- You are the only thing keeping the pirates from ravaging this planet!
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- battle is on a remote Near-Periphery planet, so winner has salvage advantage

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a PIRATE AMBUSH on an unsuspecting Inner Sphere planet! Remember, this ignoble venture is about one thing, and one thing ONLY--salvage. If you win, you have a high chance to salvage any disabled units left on the battlefield. If you lose, you're not going to have much time to pull your own disabled units out, so fight hard! To the victor go the spoils!!!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Edge Deployment Chance: 33.3% -- because this is a backwater planet, you may have landed without notice and have a good chance to ambush your target!

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in the Pirate operations
* Intelligence (None): No intel for attacker
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (LOW): 2000 BV: ~2,720 CBills / 4000 BV: ~4,720 CBills / 6000 BV: ~6,720 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Stand Your Ground: ADDITIONAL -40% pay penalty if you surrender before a **50% BV loss** -- Pirates that give up early don't get rewarded
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- battle is on a remote Near-Periphery planet, so winner has salvage advantage

***END BRIEFING***
